channel.title: AI Engineering Podcast
channel.description: Everyone's trying to figure out how to get the most out of all these AI tools. With this podcast, we share what we discover — and invite guests to explain how they use them in their day-to-day work.
channel.itunes:author: Christophe Blefari & Julien Hurault

item.title: Test Episode - Pipeline Validation
item.description: A test episode to validate the podcast publishing pipeline.
item.content:encoded:
# Test Episode - Pipeline Validation
## Episode Summary
This episode is a technical test to validate the podcast's production workflow — audio extraction, transcription, show notes generation, and RSS feed publishing.
## Key Topics
* Pipeline validation processes * Podcast production workflow testing * Audio processing and transcription systems
---
**Note:** This is a test episode. Full episodes with discussions and interviews coming soon.
